notes.player:
+10 WS and +2 damage when melee fighting daemons

Vowing to battle the beasts from the beyond, you have marked the warp-spawned for death. You gain a +10 to your Weapons Skill and deal +2 Damage in melee when fighting Daemons.

requirement.value: Hatred (Daemons) Talent or 1 Advance in Lore(Forbidden – Daemonology)
requirement.script: return (this.actor.itemTypes["specialisation"].find(i => i.name == "Forbidden – Daemonology" && i.system.skill == "lore")?.system?.advances >= 1) || this.actor.itemTypes["talent"].find(i => i.name == "Hatred(Daemons)")
